full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGRA LHA CHEN PO MCHED DGU BSKANG BSHAGS DKAR PO RGYAL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(DGRA LHA'I DKAR PO RGYAL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI MCHED GROGS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GIS ZHES @006B SDE NAS YOD PA'I YIG CHA BSKANG GSO MA MTHONG KYANG, DGRA LHA DBANG BSTOD ZHIG LA BZHI BYAS NAS BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGAGS 'CHANG SMON LAM LHUN GRUB GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
